job.description:
Trigger Ansible playbook to configure Rundeck upgrade automation settings Trigger Ansible playbook to configure Rundeck upgrade automation settings
**Run this step to prepare an environment ready for CRIMSUpgrade Steps**
What does this step do? ===============================================================================
1. Download required batch files onto environment 2. Set system environment variable
Required Fields -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. ClientName - Client Name 2. UpgradeNodeSelection - Node that is being upgraded 3. Branch - Which brand in Git (test or prod)
--- Troubleshoot Guide:
1. Nothing to note
job.name: Initialize Upgrade VM
